content: That's really helpful. I've been thinking about how to effectively communicate my startup's value proposition, and I think a strong pitch deck will be key. I'll definitely check out those resources and tips. By the way, I've also been considering reaching out to some potential investors I met at the TechConnect conference, including the CEO of StartupX, Rachel Lee. Do you have any advice on how to follow up with them and what kind of materials I should prepare?
